articles.author: Billboard Staff
articles.title: Heartthrob ‘American Idol’ Contestant Fritz Hager Impresses With James Bay Cover: Watch - Billboard
articles.description: The 22-year-old singer made new fans (and set hearts aflutter) with a performance of James Bay's “Let It Go”.
articles.content:
From guarding property to stealing hearts, Fritz Hager has been something of a surprise package on American Idol.
On another elimination night Sunday (April 24), the 22-year-old singer made new fans… [+662 chars]

articles.title: Airline fires back at star’s Twitter complaint - news.com.au
articles.description: An American flight company has hit back at Australian rapper Iggy Azalea, who had earlier taken to Twitter to complain about her recent experience with the airline.
articles.content: Iggy Azalea brutally called out an American airline company for leaving her and her one-year-old son stranded, but a staffer has since said it was her own fault.An American flight company has hit bac… [+3128 chars]

articles.author: Lara Jakes, Edward Wong, Michael Crowley
articles.title: America’s Road to the Ukraine War - The New York Times
articles.description: For years, the United States sent mixed signals about its interests in the country. Then Vladimir V. Putin made his move.
articles.content: During a steady rain, Mr. Blinken joined Dmytro Kuleba, the Ukrainian foreign minister, on a walk to the Wall of National Remembrance, where photos of soldiers who had been killed in combat with Russ… [+1515 chars]
